org.apache.paimon.format.orc

Class OrcWriterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.format.orc.OrcWriterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatWriterFactory

    public class OrcWriterFactory
extends Object
implements FormatWriterFactory
    A factory that creates an ORC FormatWriter. The factory takes a user supplied Vectorizer implementation to convert the element into an VectorizedRowBatch.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrcWriterFactory(Vectorizer<InternalRow> vectorizer)
      Creates a new OrcBulkWriterFactory using the provided Vectorizer implementation.
      OrcWriterFactory(Vectorizer<InternalRow> vectorizer, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
      Creates a new OrcBulkWriterFactory using the provided Vectorizer, Hadoop Configuration.
      OrcWriterFactory(Vectorizer<InternalRow> vectorizer, Properties writerProperties, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration configuration)
      Creates a new OrcBulkWriterFactory using the provided Vectorizer, Hadoop Configuration, ORC writer properties.

    • Method Summary

                           String compression)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: FormatWriterFactory
        Creates a writer that writes to the given stream.
        Specified by:
        create in interface FormatWriterFactory
        Parameters:
        out - The output stream to write the encoded data to.
        compression - the compression value.
        Throws:
